title: When can I get eSIM support for Pixel 3 in India?
content:
I have a pixel 3 device (US Version). I want to activate the eSIM facility on this with the Airtel network. 
Didn't find - Carrier option
Developer options - ON
OEM unlocked - Yes but grayed and faded
Also, On Searching for "Add More" in the settings, I get an Airtel Sim manager.
How to bring add carrier option?
